description: Data was generated based on running Picard over ~67,000 TCGA bam files in Google Cloud Storage in August 2016.

fields.description: Original data repository (CGHub) identifier
fields.name: CGHub_analysisID

fields.description: The MEDIAN insert size of all paired end reads where both ends mapped to the same chromosome.
fields.name: MedianInsertSize

fields.description: The minimum measured insert size.  This is usually 1 and not very useful as it is likely artifactual.
fields.name: MedianAbsoluteDeviation

fields.description: The minimum measured insert size. This is usually 1 and not very useful as it is likely artifactual.
fields.name: MinInsertSize

fields.description: The maximum measure insert size by alignment. This is usually very high representing either an artifact or possibly the presence of a structural re-arrangement.
fields.name: MaxInsertSize

fields.description: The mean insert size of the core of the distribution. Artefactual outliers in the distribution often cause calculation of nonsensical mean and stdev values.  To avoid this the distribution is first trimmed to a core distribution of +/- N median absolute deviations around the median insert size. By default N=10, but this is configurable.
fields.name: MeanInsertSize

fields.description: Standard deviation of insert sizes over the core of the distribution.
fields.name: StandardDeviation

fields.description: The total number of read pairs that were examined in the entire distribution.
fields.name: ReadPairs

fields.description: The pair orientation of the reads in this data category.
fields.name: PairOrientation

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 10% of all read pairs
fields.name: WidthOf10Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 20% of all read pairs.
fields.name: WidthOf20Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 30% of all read pairs.
fields.name: WidthOf30Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 50% of all read pairs.
fields.name: WidthOf40Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 60% of all read pairs.
fields.name: WidthOf50Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 70% of all read pairs. This metric divided by 2 should approximate the standard deviation when the insert size distribution is a normal distribution.
fields.name: WidthOf60Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 80% of all read pairs.
fields.name: WidthOf70Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 90% of all read pairs.
fields.name: WidthOf80Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 95% of all read pairs.
fields.name: WidthOf90Percent

fields.description: The width of the bins, centered around the median, that encompass 100% of all read pairs.
fields.name: WidthOf99Percent

fields.description: Always null
fields.name: sample

fields.description: Experimental strategy used to generate library e.g. WGS, WXS
fields.name: library

fields.description: The total number of read groups that were examined in the entire distribution.
fields.name: ReadGroup

fields.description: Substrate type e.g. DNA,  RNA
fields.name: analyte_type

fields.description: Experimental strategy used to generate library e.g. WGS, WXS
fields.name: library_type
